byline.original: By MIKE ISAAC and NICK WINGFIELD

abstract: Microsoft agrees to invest in Uber; its contribution, which totals about $1 billion, would be big part of Uber's financing.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has agreed to contribute a substantial amount of the financing in a recent round, which totals about $1 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.

headline.main: Microsoft Said to Invest Big Sum in Uber
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Said to Invest Big Sum in Uber

snippet: Microsoft has agreed to contribute a substantial amount of the financing in a recent round, which totals about $1 billion, people with knowledge of the matter said.
